 2023-12992023-12-15IRCC
ActImmigration and Refugee Protection Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Immigration and Refugee Protection Regulations (Immigration Loans Program)
PrecisRegulations Amending the IMMIGRATION AND REFUGEE PROTECTION REGULATIONS (IMMIGRATION LOANS PROGRAM) in order to fix the total allowed advance amount from the Consolidated Revenue Fund for the Immigration Loans Program at $300 million.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2023-0279 Publication Date: 2024-01-03
AttachmentsAttachment
precis: Regulations Amending the IMMIGRATION AND REFUGEE PROTECTION REGULATIONS (IMMIGRATION LOANS PROGRAM) in order to fix the total allowed advance amount from the Consolidated Revenue Fund for the Immigration Loans Program at $300 million.
